title: Cultivated Dream Orchard Adventure #37
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dream Orchard Entrance
rooms.description: You stand at the entrance to a mystical orchard bathed in twilight. Luminescent flowers line a cobblestone path, and the air smells of honey and starlight. Strange fruit trees with glowing blossoms stretch into the purple sky. A weathered gardener's shed stands beside an ornate iron gate leading deeper into the orchard.

items.name: weathered gardener's shed
items.description: A small wooden shed with peeling paint and a rusty lock

items.name: dream cultivation manual
items.description: An ancient book bound in silver thread with pressed flowers between the pages
items.text: The Art of Dream Cultivation: This orchard was founded in the year 1892 by the Master Gardener Morpheus. To tend dreams properly, one must understand the three keepers: Morpheus tends the seeds, Celeste harvests the blooms, and Oneiros guards the gate.

items.name: gardener's tool chest
items.description: A wooden chest with brass fittings and three compartments

items.name: gardener's journal
items.description: A leather journal with sketches of dream fruits and cultivation notes
items.text: Journal Entry: The orchard thrives! Remember the founding year - 1892 - it unlocks the middle compartment where I keep the shed key. The Master Gardener Morpheus taught me that dreams must be carefully cultivated in the Starlight Greenhouse before they can bloom.

items.name: copper key
items.description: A small copper key shaped like a crescent moon

items.name: luminescent flower bed
items.description: A bed of glowing flowers that pulse with soft light

items.name: silver acorn
items.description: A perfectly smooth acorn made of polished silver, warm to the touch

items.name: ornate iron gate
items.description: A tall gate decorated with vines and dream symbols, leading into the heart of the orchard

rooms.name: Heart of the Dream Orchard
rooms.description: The central grove of the orchard, where magnificent trees bear glowing fruit in impossible colors. Each tree is marked with a plaque bearing a name and description. Butterflies made of light flutter between the branches. A crystal fountain bubbles in the center, and a shimmering archway pulses with energy at the far end.

items.name: plaque for Morpheus Tree
items.description: A brass plaque beneath a tree bearing midnight-blue fruit
items.text: Morpheus Tree - Master Gardener. Planted the first dream seeds and tends them with wisdom. His dreams grow in the Starlight Greenhouse.

items.name: plaque for Celeste Tree
items.description: A silver plaque beneath a tree with golden star-shaped fruit
items.text: Celeste Tree - Dream Harvester. Gathers ripe dreams at dawn and dusk. She stores her tools in the Moon Shed.

items.name: plaque for Oneiros Tree
items.description: A bronze plaque beneath a tree bearing fruit that shifts between colors
items.text: Oneiros Tree - Gate Guardian. Protects the orchard and guides dreamers to awakening. His post is at the Twilight Gate.

items.name: crystal fountain
items.description: A fountain carved from a single piece of crystal, filled with water that reflects dreams

items.name: dream compass
items.description: A compass that points toward awakening rather than north

items.name: carved stone bench
items.description: A bench beneath the Morpheus Tree with inscriptions along its surface
items.text: Rest here, dreamer, and remember: To pass through the Awakening Archway, you must answer three questions. Know who planted the seeds, where dreams are cultivated, and where the guardian stands watch.

items.name: shimmering awakening archway
items.description: An archway made of woven light and morning mist. Three questions are inscribed in glowing letters across its surface.

password_questions.question: Who planted the first dream seeds?
password_questions.hint: Check the cultivation manual and the tree plaques

password_questions.question: Where are dreams cultivated?
password_questions.hint: The gardener's journal and Morpheus's plaque mention this location

password_questions.question: Where does the guardian stand watch?

rooms.name: Garden of Awakening
rooms.description: You step through the archway into a garden bathed in golden sunrise light. The dream orchard fades behind you like morning mist. A path of white stones leads to a comfortable bed surrounded by blooming flowers. The scent of fresh morning air fills your lungs, and you feel the pull of waking consciousness.

items.name: bed of awakening
items.description: A comfortable bed with white linens, positioned in a circle of blooming flowers

items.name: sunrise flowers
items.description: Flowers that bloom only at the moment of awakening, their petals catching the first light of dawn

rooms.win_message: You lie down in the bed of awakening, and the dream orchard dissolves around you. Your eyes open to the real world, but you carry with you the memory of the cultivated dreams and the wisdom of the mystical gardeners. You have successfully escaped the Cultivated Dream Orchard! You win!
